abstract: Former NBA player Lamar Odom regains consciousness and speaks for first time since being hospitalized in Las Vegas; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lamar Odom, a former basketball player and reality television star, has regained consciousness just days after being found unresponsive at a Nevada brothel.
snippet: Lamar Odom, a former basketball player and reality television star, has regained consciousness just days after being found unresponsive at a Nevada brothel.
